mapper.select: SELECT program_no programNo, employee_id employeeId, program_name programName, program_max_customer programMaxCustomer FROM program
SELECT program_no programNo, employee_id employeeId, program_name programName, program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, createdate FROM program WHERE program_no = #{programNo}

SELECT p.employee_id employeeId, p.program_memo programMemo, p.program_day programDay, d.employee_name employeeName, d.employee_phone employeePhone, d.employee_email employeeEmail, b.branch_name branchName, i.employee_img_file_name FROM program p INNER JOIN employee e ON p.employee_id = e.employee_id INNER JOIN branch b ON e.branch_no = b.branch_no INNER JOIN employee_detail d ON e.employee_no = d.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN employee_img i ON e.employee_no = i.employee_no WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
